nodes.id: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

zh-cn: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准
实践是检验真理的标准
en: Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth

description.zh-cn: 一篇在中国现代思想解放史上具有重要影响的文章，它的发表引发了全国范围的真理标准大讨论，为“拨乱反正”和改革开放奠定了思想基础。
description.en: An article of significant influence in the history of modern Chinese ideological emancipation. Its publication triggered a nationwide great discussion on the criterion of truth, laying the ideological foundation for 'Boluan Fanzheng' and the reform and opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者、南京大学哲学系教师，《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》一文的原作者。
description.en: A Chinese scholar, professor in the Department of Philosophy at Nanjing University, and the original author of the article 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth'.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国南京市的一所著名高等学府。
description.en: A prominent institution of higher learning located in Nanjing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人，曾任中共中央主席和总书记。他审定了《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》的最终稿。
description.en: A leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman and General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee. He reviewed and approved the final version of 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth'.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部
en: Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责党组织和干部工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for party organization and cadre work.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管的报纸，主要面向知识分子。
description.en: A newspaper supervised by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, primarily aimed at intellectuals.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China.

en: The great discussion on the criterion of truth

description.zh-cn: 1978年在中国大陆展开的一场关于真理检验标准的思想解放运动，旨在批判“两个凡是”的观点。
description.en: An ideological emancipation movement launched in mainland China in 1978 concerning the criterion for testing truth, aimed at criticizing the 'Two Whatevers' viewpoint.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，中华人民共和国改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and the chief architect of China's reform and opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 指在文化大革命结束后，由邓小平、胡耀邦等人主导的，纠正文革期间及以前的“左”倾错误的政治、思想、组织和经济调整时期。
description.en: Refers to the period after the end of the Cultural Revolution, led by Deng Xiaoping, Hu Yaobang, and others, to correct the 'leftist' errors of the Cultural Revolution and earlier periods through political, ideological, organizational, and economic adjustments.

description.zh-cn: 指“凡是毛主席作出的决策，我们都坚决维护；凡是毛主席的指示，我们都始终不渝地遵循”的政治口号，是《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》一文旨在批判的核心观点。
description.en: A political slogan referring to 'We will resolutely uphold whatever policy decisions Chairman Mao made, and unswervingly follow whatever instructions Chairman Mao gave.' It was the core viewpoint criticized by the article 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东逝世后的中国最高领导人，“两个凡是”方针的主要支持者。
description.en: The paramount leader of China after Mao Zedong's death and the main proponent of the 'Two Whatevers' policy.

en: Party School of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党培养高级领导干部的学校。
description.en: The school for training senior leading cadres of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央党校的内部刊物，《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》一文最早于此发表。
description.en: An internal publication of the Party School of the CPC Central Committee, where 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth' was first published.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家通讯社。
description.en: The state news agency of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the Chinese People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议
en: Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党历史上具有深远意义的会议，标志着中国进入改革开放新时期，邓小平在此次会议后确立了其领导核心地位。
description.en: A meeting of profound significance in the history of the Communist Party of China, marking China's entry into a new era of reform and opening-up. Deng Xiaoping established his core leadership position after this plenum.

description.zh-cn: 一种哲学理论，强调思想和理论的实际效果和应用价值。其观点与《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》有相似之处。
description.en: A philosophical theory that emphasizes the practical effects and application value of ideas and theories. Its views bear similarities to 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth'.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家、经济学家、社会学家，马克思主义的创始人之一。
description.en: A German philosopher, economist, sociologist, and one of the founders of Marxism.

relationships.target: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 胡福明是《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》一文的原作者。
description.en: Hu Fuming was the original author of the article 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth'.

relationships.target: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦审定了《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》的最终稿。
description.en: Hu Yaobang reviewed and approved the final version of 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth'.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦在1978年审定《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》时，担任中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: Hu Yaobang served as the Minister of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee in 1978 when he approved 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth'.

relationships.target: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 《光明日报》修改并于1978年5月11日以“特约评论员”名义首次公开发表了《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》。
description.en: Guangming Daily revised and publicly published 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth' for the first time on May 11, 1978, under the byline 'Special Commentator'.

relationships.target: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 《理论动态》于1978年5月10日在其第60期上首次发表（内部刊物）了《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》。
description.en: 'Theoretical Trends' first published (internally) 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth' in its 60th issue on May 10, 1978.

relationships.target: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 《人民日报》于1978年5月12日转载了《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》。
description.en: The People's Daily reprinted 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth' on May 12, 1978.

relationships.target: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 《解放军报》于1978年5月12日转载了《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》。
description.en: The PLA Daily reprinted 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth' on May 12, 1978.

relationships.target: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 新华社于1978年5月11日转发了《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》。
description.en: Xinhua News Agency forwarded 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth' on May 11, 1978.

relationships.source: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准
relationships.target: 真理标准大讨论

description.zh-cn: 该文的公开发表标志着中华人民共和国真理标准大讨论的开始。
description.en: The public release of this article marked the beginning of the great discussion on the criterion of truth in the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 真理标准大讨论

description.zh-cn: 邓小平是真理标准大讨论的发动者与领导者。然而，《光明日报》原副总编马沛文曾撰文指出，该文章的创作发表和邓小平无直接关系。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping was the initiator and leader of the great discussion on the criterion of truth. However, Ma Peiwen, former deputy editor-in-chief of Guangming Daily, wrote that the creation and publication of the article had no direct relationship with Deng Xiaoping.

relationships.target: 拨乱反正

description.zh-cn: 真理标准大讨论是拨乱反正运动的重要组成部分。
description.en: The great discussion on the criterion of truth was an important part of the 'Boluan Fanzheng' movement.

relationships.target: 两个凡是

description.zh-cn: 胡福明撰写《实践是检验真理的标准》一文旨在反驳“两个凡是”的观点。
description.en: Hu Fuming wrote the article 'Practice is the Criterion for Testing Truth' with the aim of refuting the 'Two Whatevers' viewpoint.

relationships.source: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准
relationships.target: 两个凡是

description.zh-cn: 该文的发表及其引发的讨论，从理论上动摇了“两个凡是”的执政基础。
description.en: The publication of this article and the ensuing discussion theoretically undermined the governing basis of the 'Two Whatevers'.

relationships.source: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准
relationships.target: 华国锋

description.zh-cn: 该文动摇了华国锋执政的理论基础，即“两个凡是”。
description.en: This article undermined the theoretical basis of Hua Guofeng's rule, namely the 'Two Whatevers'.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议
relationships.target: 邓小平

description.zh-cn: 在中共十一届三中全会上，邓小平逐渐取代华国锋掌握了党和国家的最高权力，确立了其领导核心地位。
description.en: At the Third Plenary Session of the 11th CPC Central Committee, Deng Xiaoping gradually replaced Hua Guofeng to grasp the supreme power of the party and state, establishing his core leadership position.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议
relationships.target: 华国锋

description.zh-cn: 在中共十一届三中全会上，邓小平逐渐取代华国锋掌握了党和国家的最高权力。
description.en: At the Third Plenary Session of the 11th CPC Central Committee, Deng Xiaoping gradually replaced Hua Guofeng to grasp the supreme power of the party and state.

relationships.target: 中共中央党校

description.zh-cn: 《理论动态》是中共中央党校的内部刊物。
description.en: 'Theoretical Trends' is an internal publication of the Party School of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 文中引用了马克思关于“人应该在实践中证明自己思维的真理性”的论述。
description.en: The article quotes Marx's statement that 'Man must prove the truth...of his thinking in practice'.

relationships.target: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 文中引用了毛泽东在《实践论》中关于“真理的标准只能是社会的实践”的论述。
description.en: The article quotes Mao Zedong's statement from 'On Practice' that 'The criterion of the truth can only be social practice'.

relationships.target: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 该文的核心观点与实用主义（实验主义）中“实验是真理的唯一试金石”的观点相似，但此联系在当时被中共官方批判和否认。
description.en: The core idea of the article is similar to the pragmatist (experimentalist) view that 'experiment is the only touchstone of truth,' but this connection was criticized and denied by CPC officials at the time.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国教育部
relationships.target: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准

description.zh-cn: 2019年，中华人民共和国教育部将《实践是检验真理的唯一标准》全文收录进普通高中语文教科书。
description.en: In 2019, the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China included the full text of 'Practice is the Sole Criterion for Testing Truth' in the national high school Chinese language textbook.
